mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM JOBTALK WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND ID=#{search}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOBTALK(JOBTALKSEQ, MEMBERID, JOBTALK_REF, JOBTALK_TITLE, JOBTALK_CONTENT, WDATE, DEL, JOBTALK_READCOUNT) VALUES(JOBTALKSEQ_JOBTALK.NEXTVAL, #{memberid}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(JOBTALK_REF)+1, 0) FROM JOBTALK), #{jobtalk_title}, #{jobtalk_content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
